title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.2 - Speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.2 - Speed limits

State Regulations
(a) The limits
specified or established herein, except where a special hazard exists that
requires lower speed for compliance with the preceding section, shall be
maximum lawful speeds and no person shall drive a vehicle on the vehicular
crossing at a speed in excess of such maximum limits. (1)

Passenger cars--40 m.p.h. (2)

Other vehicles--30 m.p.h. (3)

In truck yards and trailer areas--10
m.p.h., unless conditions as herein-above stated are such that safety requires
a speed of less than 10 m.p.h. (b) Nothing herein contained shall be
construed to apply to police and fire department vehicles, ambulances and to
other emergency vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
